column6:
There is a huge explosion in the side of the Triskelion-the side housing superhuman criminals. And from the acrid smoke emerges a man seething with vengeance-a man who wants Peter Parker dead! That man is Norman Osborn, the Green Goblin! And for the web-spinner, things are about to get out of control. All this and the Shocker, too! Ya can't miss it!,2007,8
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | penciller (cover):Stuart Immonen | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Justin Ponsor
